text:
All the deities and the sages requested lord Shiva to get married, but Shiva did not want to curtail his freedom by getting married.
 When the deities insisted he told them to find a suitable match for him.
 Brahma and Vishnu told Shiva about the tremendous penance Uma was doing to him (Shiva) as her husband.
 They also requested him have to go to her (uma) and fulfill her desire.
 Lord Shiva agreed.
title: Brahmaji makes a request to Lord Shiva
